actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer that bill entitled, "a bill for the relief of Aetna Insurance Company, and other Insurance Companies" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims a bill for the relief of a named company.

titles.title: A resolution to refer that bill entitled, "a bill for the relief of Aetna Insurance Company, and other Insurance Companies" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.
